notesStmt.note: Clipped note from John Frederick Lewis on mat "Rajani (?) school. Sotheby's Sale London Nov. 17, 1926. GBP 4. No. 485" Possibly from same album as M 286-295. Untranslated slip of Persian pasted to mat.
